sample

Class ChanceCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.ChanceCard

  • public class ChanceCard
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ChanceCard represents a a chance card that has a card number and a group type and a description. The type of action depends on what card number is instantiated.

      • doAction

        public void doAction(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> tiles,
                     Player p,
                     Bank b,
                     Game g,
                     int dice)
        This method does the action depending on the card number given. The action will be done through switch case.
        Parameters:
        tiles - of the board.
        p - is the current player of the game.
        b - is the bank object of the game.
        g - is the game object.
        dice - the integer value of the dice.
